biotools.summary: Estimate the gene flow parameter q for a collection of two or more semi-isolated populations by (pseudo) maximum likelihood using either single or multi locus, haploid or diploid, genotype data. Suitable molecular data types minimally include allozymes, microsatellites, and RFLPs.

bioschemas.name: PMLE
bioschemas.summary: Estimate the gene flow parameter q for a collection of two or more semi-isolated populations by (pseudo) maximum likelihood using either single or multi locus, haploid or diploid, genotype data. Suitable molecular data types minimally include allozymes, microsatellites, and RFLPs.
